title: About
content:
About this site # I’m nearing my 4 year anniversary at Benchling and, in the tradition of an undergraduate thesis at the end of college, I thought it’d be worth writing up all of my learnings in a place where others can read them.
The target audience for this is current Benchlings and ex-Benchlings, though there’s nothing company-sensitive or non-public on this site, obviously.
What is your goal in writing this? # My only goal is to write down what I’ve learned in a place where others can see it. I don’t expect to win any Pulitzer’s. I don’t expect my writing here to have any effect (positive or negative) on my day job.
What inspired you to do this? # This site is partly inspired by Steve Yegge, Joel Spolsky, and Dan Luu. All three of them are far better writers, programmers, and leaders than I am, so go read their blogs.
